issue.title: va_copy missing from Standard macros table

discussion.p: In "Table 122 -- Standard macros" of , which lists the 56 macros inherited from C library, va_copy seems to be missing. But in "Table 21 -- Header <cstdarg> synopsis" (), there is.
discussion.blockquote: Mark as Tentatively NAD Editorial, if Pete disagrees, Howard will move to Tentatively Ready

resolution.p: Add va_copy to Table 122 -- Standard macros in .
